entries.femaleVariant: Oh, V, V – you never learn, do you?
You laugh – but fifty years in purgatory? Enough time for a guy to get his head on straight. Come to some conclusions.
Oh, is it chat time? Ugh... C'mon, hit me with those pearls of wisdom, get this over with.
People don't change. 'Specially not people like Kirk.
Think I don't know? Am I lendin' Kirk cred for a new Kiroshi? Are we goin' into biz together?
Kirk said I stood to gain some scratch.
Easy enough in Night City. Real trick's survivin' long enough to spend it.
No. 'Course somethin' stinks. But in this town, can't just wrinkle your nose an' look the other way.
entries.maleVariant: No. 'Course somethin' stinks. But in this town, ya can't just wrinkle your nose an' look the other way.

entries.femaleVariant: Gotta find what's stinkin' up the joint, and why. Otherwise, you'll step right in it.
entries.maleVariant: You gotta find what's stinkin' up the joint, and why. Otherwise, you'll step right in it.

entries.femaleVariant: Came up in these streets, Johnny. Can take care of myself.
